Home » 40P21 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
12 Saññojanādichagocchaka, Kusalattika
Saññojanādichagocchaka, Kusalattika
22.
60Nasaññojanaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
61Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
23.
62Naganthaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
63Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
24.
64Naoghaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ogho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
65Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
25.
66Nayogaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā yogo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
67Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
26.
68Nanīvaraṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
69Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
27.
70Naparāmāsaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
71Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
